00238 inline Shape Shape::operator+ (const Shape& shape) const
00239 {
00240     Shape temp;
00241     
00242     // Copy the pixels of this shape
00243     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i )
00244         temp.addPixel( (*this)(i) );
00245     
00246     // Copy the pixels of the second shape
00247     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < shape.size(); ++i )
00248         temp.addPixel( shape(i) );
00249     
00250     return temp;
00251 };

00253 
00254 inline bool Shape::operator< (const Shape& shape)
00255 {
00256     bool shapeAbove = (this->bottomPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first);
00257     
00258     if ( shapeAbove )
00259         return true;
00260     else
00261     {
00262         bool shapeBelow = (this->bottomPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first);
00263         
00264         if ( shapeBelow )
00265             return false;
00266         else
00267         {
00268             // Shapes in the same line
00269             bool shapeOnTheLeft     = (this->leftPixel().second < shape.leftPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second <= shape.leftPixel().second);
00270             bool shapeOnTheRight    = (this->leftPixel().second >= shape.rightPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second > shape.rightPixel().second);
00271             
00272             if ( shapeOnTheLeft )
00273                 return true;
00274             else
00275             {
00276                 if ( shapeOnTheRight )
00277                     return false;
00278                 else
00279                     return true;
00280             }
00281         }
00282     }
00283 };

00328 inline Pixel Shape::barycenter () const
00329 {
00330     Pixel barycenter(0,0);
00331     
00332     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < pixels_.size(); ++i )
00333     {
00334         barycenter.first    += pixels_.at(i).first;
00335         barycenter.second   += pixels_.at(i).second;
00336     }
00337     barycenter.first    = barycenter.first  / size_;
00338     barycenter.second   = barycenter.second / size_;
00339     
00340     return barycenter;
00341 };
